matched.match_rationale: Smitashree Panda is a Talent Acquisition Executive at Rupeek, driving end-to-end hiring for PAN India positions, which is nearly identical to HR Professional roles.

detailed_profile.name: Smitashree Panda
detailed_profile.about: As an experienced HR Recruiter with a strong background in both IT and Non-IT hiring, I specialize in full-cycle recruitment across volume, lateral, and leadership roles. At Rupeek Fintech, I drive end-to-end hiring for PAN India positions including Gold Loan Managers, Sales Managers, and Regional Heads. I collaborate closely with business teams to forecast hiring needs, ensure smooth onboarding, and maintain business continuity by addressing attrition risks. My work also involves vendor coordination, grievance handling, and training support. Previously at Right Avenue Infotech, I focused on Domestic IT recruitment, hiring across junior to senior levels for both permanent and C2H roles. I gained hands-on experience in sourcing, screening, interview coordination, and client communication. Known for being detail-oriented and proactive, I bring a balance of operational efficiency and candidate engagement to every hiring process. I enjoy working in fast-paced environments and continuously seek to improve hiring outcomes through structured processes and strong stakeholder management.

detailed_profile.name: Sonali Verma
detailed_profile.position: Senior HR and EA to CEO @Rupeek
detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. I have successfully hired candidates for roles such as Architect, Engineering Manager, SDE 2, and SDE, in Backend, UI, UX, Devops, and Testing. With a MBA in Finance from Medi-Caps University and a BCom from St. Paul Institute of Professional Studies, I have a strong academic background and a keen interest in the product industry. I have also gained valuable experience in client handling, team mentoring, and market research, working with startups and established firms such as Flash , Thimblerr, Zetasuite, Manupatra, UpSwing, KlubWorks, InfraMarket, Jumio, Insticator, Mystifly, Chep, and Reliance. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

detailed_profile.about: Results-driven Backend Engineer with 6+ years of experience leading and mentoring a team of 7‚Äì10 software engineers in designing and optimizing scalable, resilient, and secure fintech and enterprise solutions. Passionate about delivering robust solutions that seamlessly integrate into complex ecosystems.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin Private Limited
positions.description: I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients. üîπ Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations. üîπ Supercharging ML Feature Engineering We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency‚Äîcutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients.

🔹 Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction
By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations.

🔹 Supercharging ML Feature Engineering
We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency—cutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin
positions.description: Designed and developed a multi-tenant microservice from scratch, enabling seamless partner API integration while reducing customization overhead. This architecture streamlined client onboarding through a configuration-driven approach, significantly enhancing system flexibility. üîπ Accelerated Loan Processing: Optimized workflows to reduce loan processing time from 3-4 days to just 5 hours, improving operational efficiency. üîπ Integrated partial, full, and EMI payment flows across multiple gateways to support loans and savings transactions, enhancing scalability and collaboration for various bank and FinTech clients. üîπ Achieved a 20% increase in revenue, reduced customer support time by 40%, and shortened payment reconciliation by up to 70%. üîπ Developed OAuth2-based authentication and centralized Spring Security (RBAC) for partner onboarding, enabling secure, hierarchical user management and meeting payment gateway compliance üîπ Enhanced Risk Mitigation: Implemented questionnaire and credit bureau features, providing deeper insights for more accurate credit risk assessment. üîπ Security & Scalability: Integrated OAuth2-based authentication and centralized configuration management, ensuring robust security and scalability across diverse financial use cases. üîπ High-Code Quality & Reliability: Achieved 98% test coverage, delivering a highly reliable microservice for critical financial transactions.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

I‚Äôm passionate about crafting user-centric solutions that balance performance, scalability, and business value. My long-term vision is to blend fintech innovation with real-time data processing to simplify financial products for millions.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Neural CNN
projects.description: This research project focuses on the prediction and classification of heart diseases using machine learning techniques, particularly neural network architecture. The primary objective is to accurately identify various types of heart diseases and assess the likelihood of their occurrence. The proposed system not only predicts the presence of heart disease but also suggests follow-up actions or treatment recommendations based on the analysis. A neural network-based model is developed to classify heart diseases into distinct categories with high accuracy and efficiency. Comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms such as KNN, ANN, SVM, Naive Bayes, and Decision trees is conducted to evaluate performance. By integrating artificial intelligence into healthcare, this project aims to provide a user-friendly solution for individuals to monitor their heart health effectively, contributing to advancements in cardiovascular disease detection and management.

projects.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.

I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries.

detailed_profile.about: As a results-driven Full Stack Software Engineer (B.E. in Computer Science, 8.6/10, Bangalore Institute of Technology), I thrive on building scalable, impactful solutions‚Äîparticularly in the fintech domain, where technology directly improves financial accessibility and trust. üîπ Currently SDE-1 at Rupeek Fintech, I‚Äôve been instrumental in developing systems that drive measurable business outcomes: ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded end-to-end development of a lead generation system (12 REST APIs), improving efficiency by 25%. ‚Ä¢ Designed and launched the Job Loss Plan workflow, generating ‚Çπ5.5 lakh in monthly revenue. ‚Ä¢ Migrated to DeepStream 2.0, enhancing throughput by 40% and optimizing real-time processing. üîπ Beyond work, I channel my passion into side projects: ‚Ä¢ RecruiterEmail-Pro ‚Äì an automated cold outreach platform achieving a 30% mock success rate. ‚Ä¢ BIT Placement Cell Portal ‚Äì streamlined placements for 500+ students, saving 15+ admin hours weekly. üîπ Technical Expertise ‚Ä¢ Languages & Frameworks: Node.js, Java Spring Boot, React.js ‚Ä¢ Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB ‚Ä¢ Practices: Microservices, REST API Design, Real-time Processing ‚Ä¢ Tools: Docker, Jenkins, Git, Redis üîπ Recognition & Continuous Learning ‚Ä¢ Ranked in the Top 10% on LeetCode with 500+ problems solved. ‚Ä¢ Gold Medalist in the Mathematics Olympiad among 1,200+ participants. ‚Ä¢ Certified in JavaScript (Udemy), SQL & Problem Solving (HackerRank). I‚Äôm passionate about crafting user-centric solutions that balance performance, scalability, and business value. My long-term vision is to blend fintech innovation with real-time data processing to simplify financial products for millions.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Neural CNN
projects.description: This research project focuses on the prediction and classification of heart diseases using machine learning techniques, particularly neural network architecture. The primary objective is to accurately identify various types of heart diseases and assess the likelihood of their occurrence. The proposed system not only predicts the presence of heart disease but also suggests follow-up actions or treatment recommendations based on the analysis. A neural network-based model is developed to classify heart diseases into distinct categories with high accuracy and efficiency. Comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms such as KNN, ANN, SVM, Naive Bayes, and Decision trees is conducted to evaluate performance. By integrating artificial intelligence into healthcare, this project aims to provide a user-friendly solution for individuals to monitor their heart health effectively, contributing to advancements in cardiovascular disease detection and management.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Neural CNN
projects.description: This research project focuses on the prediction and classification of heart diseases using machine learning techniques, particularly neural network architecture. The primary objective is to accurately identify various types of heart diseases and assess the likelihood of their occurrence. The proposed system not only predicts the presence of heart disease but also suggests follow-up actions or treatment recommendations based on the analysis. A neural network-based model is developed to classify heart diseases into distinct categories with high accuracy and efficiency. Comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms such as KNN, ANN, SVM, Naive Bayes, and Decision trees is conducted to evaluate performance. By integrating artificial intelligence into healthcare, this project aims to provide a user-friendly solution for individuals to monitor their heart health effectively, contributing to advancements in cardiovascular disease detection and management.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients.

🔹 Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction
By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations.

🔹 Supercharging ML Feature Engineering
We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency—cutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project. The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I: Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization. Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system. Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency. Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications. This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

I‚Äôm passionate about crafting user-centric solutions that balance performance, scalability, and business value. My long-term vision is to blend fintech innovation with real-time data processing to simplify financial products for millions.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Neural CNN
projects.description: This research project focuses on the prediction and classification of heart diseases using machine learning techniques, particularly neural network architecture. The primary objective is to accurately identify various types of heart diseases and assess the likelihood of their occurrence. The proposed system not only predicts the presence of heart disease but also suggests follow-up actions or treatment recommendations based on the analysis. A neural network-based model is developed to classify heart diseases into distinct categories with high accuracy and efficiency. Comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms such as KNN, ANN, SVM, Naive Bayes, and Decision trees is conducted to evaluate performance. By integrating artificial intelligence into healthcare, this project aims to provide a user-friendly solution for individuals to monitor their heart health effectively, contributing to advancements in cardiovascular disease detection and management.

detailed_profile.name: Prateek Kumar
detailed_profile.position: SDE-1 @ Rupeek Fintech | Full Stack Developer | Expert in Microservices, Node.js, Java Spring Boot, React.js | Delivering Scalable Solutions for Fintech Innovation
detailed_profile.about: As a results-driven Full Stack Software Engineer (B.E. in Computer Science, 8.6/10, Bangalore Institute of Technology), I thrive on building scalable, impactful solutions‚Äîparticularly in the fintech domain, where technology directly improves financial accessibility and trust. üîπ Currently SDE-1 at Rupeek Fintech, I‚Äôve been instrumental in developing systems that drive measurable business outcomes: ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded end-to-end development of a lead generation system (12 REST APIs), improving efficiency by 25%. ‚Ä¢ Designed and launched the Job Loss Plan workflow, generating ‚Çπ5.5 lakh in monthly revenue. ‚Ä¢ Migrated to DeepStream 2.0, enhancing throughput by 40% and optimizing real-time processing. üîπ Beyond work, I channel my passion into side projects: ‚Ä¢ RecruiterEmail-Pro ‚Äì an automated cold outreach platform achieving a 30% mock success rate. ‚Ä¢ BIT Placement Cell Portal ‚Äì streamlined placements for 500+ students, saving 15+ admin hours weekly. üîπ Technical Expertise ‚Ä¢ Languages & Frameworks: Node.js, Java Spring Boot, React.js ‚Ä¢ Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB ‚Ä¢ Practices: Microservices, REST API Design, Real-time Processing ‚Ä¢ Tools: Docker, Jenkins, Git, Redis üîπ Recognition & Continuous Learning ‚Ä¢ Ranked in the Top 10% on LeetCode with 500+ problems solved. ‚Ä¢ Gold Medalist in the Mathematics Olympiad among 1,200+ participants. ‚Ä¢ Certified in JavaScript (Udemy), SQL & Problem Solving (HackerRank). I‚Äôm passionate about crafting user-centric solutions that balance performance, scalability, and business value. My long-term vision is to blend fintech innovation with real-time data processing to simplify financial products for millions.

experience.title: SDE 1
experience.description:
- Created a lead generation system with 12 REST API endpoints, boosting lead capture efficiency by 25% and saving 15 hours monthly in decision-making.

- Embedded Double Signatory functionality into the Appraiser App and E-mudra Webview, reducing e-signature processing time by 30% for 1,000+ monthly RCPL documents.

- Launched a Job Loss Plan insurance workflow for salaried customers, increasing monthly revenue by 5.5 lakh INR within 3 months.

- Upgraded play core libraries, enhancing app performance for 50,000+ users and cutting crash rates by 18% through obfuscation and testing.

- Spearheaded DeepStream 2.0 migration for real-time data processing, elevating data throughput by 40% for Vue.js and Node.js applications.

- Revamped SIB fund transfer flow by reducing LA-level events from 3 to 2, eliminating Fund Transfer trigger for better efficiency. Enabled auto-refreshal post E-sign and streamlined disbursement via Branch packet acceptance, improving reconciliation.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Neural CNN
projects.description: This research project focuses on the prediction and classification of heart diseases using machine learning techniques, particularly neural network architecture. The primary objective is to accurately identify various types of heart diseases and assess the likelihood of their occurrence. The proposed system not only predicts the presence of heart disease but also suggests follow-up actions or treatment recommendations based on the analysis. A neural network-based model is developed to classify heart diseases into distinct categories with high accuracy and efficiency. Comparative analysis of various machine learning algorithms such as KNN, ANN, SVM, Naive Bayes, and Decision trees is conducted to evaluate performance. By integrating artificial intelligence into healthcare, this project aims to provide a user-friendly solution for individuals to monitor their heart health effectively, contributing to advancements in cardiovascular disease detection and management.

projects.description: Crime Management System is a web based application for online complaining and computerized management of crime records using PHP. police can use this software to manage different crimes and some of the work which is done manually in police station. This project is mainly useful for the law and enforcement agencies.

detailed_profile.position: Senior Backend Engineer | Java | Spring Boot | Microservices | AWS | Kafka | Fintech | Data Engineering || Apache Spark || Python II AI II LLM II AI Agents ll Docker || Kubernetes |l Distributed Systems
detailed_profile.about: Results-driven Backend Engineer with 6+ years of experience leading and mentoring a team of 7‚Äì10 software engineers in designing and optimizing scalable, resilient, and secure fintech and enterprise solutions. Expertise in Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Kafka, Python, and microservices architecture. Proven ability to architect and implement high-performance backend systems, leveraging Apache Spark to build efficient big data pipelines that drive data-driven decision-making and machine learning feature engineering. Passionate about delivering robust solutions that seamlessly integrate into complex ecosystems.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin Private Limited
positions.description: I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients. üîπ Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations. üîπ Supercharging ML Feature Engineering We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency‚Äîcutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients.

🔹 Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction
By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations.

🔹 Supercharging ML Feature Engineering
We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency—cutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin
positions.description: Designed and developed a multi-tenant microservice from scratch, enabling seamless partner API integration while reducing customization overhead. This architecture streamlined client onboarding through a configuration-driven approach, significantly enhancing system flexibility. üîπ Accelerated Loan Processing: Optimized workflows to reduce loan processing time from 3-4 days to just 5 hours, improving operational efficiency. üîπ Integrated partial, full, and EMI payment flows across multiple gateways to support loans and savings transactions, enhancing scalability and collaboration for various bank and FinTech clients. üîπ Achieved a 20% increase in revenue, reduced customer support time by 40%, and shortened payment reconciliation by up to 70%. üîπ Developed OAuth2-based authentication and centralized Spring Security (RBAC) for partner onboarding, enabling secure, hierarchical user management and meeting payment gateway compliance üîπ Enhanced Risk Mitigation: Implemented questionnaire and credit bureau features, providing deeper insights for more accurate credit risk assessment. üîπ Security & Scalability: Integrated OAuth2-based authentication and centralized configuration management, ensuring robust security and scalability across diverse financial use cases. üîπ High-Code Quality & Reliability: Achieved 98% test coverage, delivering a highly reliable microservice for critical financial transactions.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
Designed and developed a multi-tenant microservice from scratch, enabling seamless partner API integration while reducing customization overhead. This architecture streamlined client onboarding through a configuration-driven approach, significantly enhancing system flexibility.

🔹 Accelerated Loan Processing: Optimized workflows to reduce loan processing time from 3-4 days to just 5 hours, improving operational efficiency.

🔹 Integrated partial, full, and EMI payment flows across multiple gateways to support loans and
savings transactions, enhancing scalability and collaboration for various bank and FinTech
clients.

🔹 Achieved a 20% increase in revenue, reduced customer support time by 40%, and shortened
payment reconciliation by up to 70%.

🔹 Developed OAuth2-based authentication and centralized Spring Security (RBAC) for partner
onboarding, enabling secure, hierarchical user management and meeting payment gateway
compliance

🔹 Enhanced Risk Mitigation: Implemented questionnaire and credit bureau features, providing deeper insights for more accurate credit risk assessment.

🔹 Security & Scalability: Integrated OAuth2-based authentication and centralized configuration management, ensuring robust security and scalability across diverse financial use cases.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

detailed_profile.about: As a recent graduate of R.V. College of Engineering with a BE in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, I am passionate about applying my skills in data analysis, Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Power BI, Tableau, and Machine Learning to solve real-world problems and create value for businesses. During my internship at Rupeek Fintech Pvt. Ltd., I demonstrated my ability to lead a pilot initiative, implementing cost-effective strategies to optimize resource allocation and address manpower shortages. I generated insightful reports to facilitate data-driven decision-making and conducted in-depth analysis of customer data, identifying areas for business improvement. I also collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, delivering high-quality results within tight deadlines. I am currently seeking a Data Analyst position, where I can leverage my expertise in data analysis and optimization, and contribute to the growth and success of the organization. I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and enhance my skills and knowledge in the field. I am confident that I can add value to any team and project with my analytical, technical, and communication skills.

detailed_profile.about: Results-driven Backend Engineer with 6+ years of experience leading and mentoring a team of 7‚Äì10 software engineers in designing and optimizing scalable, resilient, and secure fintech and enterprise solutions. Expertise in Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Kafka, Python, and microservices architecture. Proven ability to architect and implement high-performance backend systems, leveraging Apache Spark to build efficient big data pipelines that drive data-driven decision-making and machine learning feature engineering. Passionate about delivering robust solutions that seamlessly integrate into complex ecosystems.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin Private Limited
positions.description: I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients. üîπ Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations. üîπ Supercharging ML Feature Engineering We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency‚Äîcutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients.

🔹 Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction
By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations.

🔹 Supercharging ML Feature Engineering
We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency—cutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project. The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I: Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization. Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system. Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency. Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications. This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

projects.title: Dominos Pizza Sales
projects.description: Developed and implemented SQL queries to analyze Domino's pizza sales data. Key analyses included total orders, revenue calculation, most ordered and highest-priced pizzas, order distributions by time and size, and revenue breakdowns by pizza type and category. Leveraged advanced SQL techniques like JOINs, subqueries, and window functions to generate insightful business metrics and trends.

projects.title: Election AD Spend Analysis
projects.description: Conducted election ad spend analysis using Python libraries (Pandas, Plotly) to visualize total ad spend by state, average voter turnout, top parties by ad spend, and correlations between ad spend and voter turnout. Merged multiple datasets, performed data cleaning, and created insightful visualizations to support electoral strategy insights.

detailed_profile.name: Sonali Verma
detailed_profile.position: Senior HR and EA to CEO @Rupeek
detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. I have successfully hired candidates for roles such as Architect, Engineering Manager, SDE 2, and SDE, in Backend, UI, UX, Devops, and Testing. With a MBA in Finance from Medi-Caps University and a BCom from St. Paul Institute of Professional Studies, I have a strong academic background and a keen interest in the product industry. I have also gained valuable experience in client handling, team mentoring, and market research, working with startups and established firms such as Flash , Thimblerr, Zetasuite, Manupatra, UpSwing, KlubWorks, InfraMarket, Jumio, Insticator, Mystifly, Chep, and Reliance. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

detailed_profile.name: Sonali Verma
detailed_profile.position: Senior HR and EA to CEO @Rupeek
detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. I have successfully hired candidates for roles such as Architect, Engineering Manager, SDE 2, and SDE, in Backend, UI, UX, Devops, and Testing. With a MBA in Finance from Medi-Caps University and a BCom from St. Paul Institute of Professional Studies, I have a strong academic background and a keen interest in the product industry. I have also gained valuable experience in client handling, team mentoring, and market research, working with startups and established firms such as Flash , Thimblerr, Zetasuite, Manupatra, UpSwing, KlubWorks, InfraMarket, Jumio, Insticator, Mystifly, Chep, and Reliance. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description:
Established a bootstrapped cloud kitchen venture with B2C (On-Demand Deliveries) & B2B (Corporate services) business verticals 


KEY ACHIEVEMENTS 

‚Ä¢	Achieved 5x growth in users and doubled revenues Y-o-Y; scaled revenues to ‚Çπ3.5 crores/year and 2000+ B2B, 500+ B2C orders/day

detailed_profile.position: Senior HR and EA to CEO @Rupeek
detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. I have successfully hired candidates for roles such as Architect, Engineering Manager, SDE 2, and SDE, in Backend, UI, UX, Devops, and Testing. With a MBA in Finance from Medi-Caps University and a BCom from St. Paul Institute of Professional Studies, I have a strong academic background and a keen interest in the product industry. I have also gained valuable experience in client handling, team mentoring, and market research, working with startups and established firms such as Flash , Thimblerr, Zetasuite, Manupatra, UpSwing, KlubWorks, InfraMarket, Jumio, Insticator, Mystifly, Chep, and Reliance. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

projects.title: Dominos Pizza Sales
projects.description: Developed and implemented SQL queries to analyze Domino's pizza sales data. Key analyses included total orders, revenue calculation, most ordered and highest-priced pizzas, order distributions by time and size, and revenue breakdowns by pizza type and category. Leveraged advanced SQL techniques like JOINs, subqueries, and window functions to generate insightful business metrics and trends.

projects.title: Election AD Spend Analysis
projects.description: Conducted election ad spend analysis using Python libraries (Pandas, Plotly) to visualize total ad spend by state, average voter turnout, top parties by ad spend, and correlations between ad spend and voter turnout. Merged multiple datasets, performed data cleaning, and created insightful visualizations to support electoral strategy insights.

Streamlining operational processes for efficiency and scalability.

detailed_profile.name: Sonali Verma
detailed_profile.position: Senior HR and EA to CEO @Rupeek
detailed_profile.about: Working as a HR and EA at Rupeek , I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and placing top talent across various levels and domains. I have successfully hired candidates for roles such as Architect, Engineering Manager, SDE 2, and SDE, in Backend, UI, UX, Devops, and Testing. With a MBA in Finance from Medi-Caps University and a BCom from St. Paul Institute of Professional Studies, I have a strong academic background and a keen interest in the product industry. I have also gained valuable experience in client handling, team mentoring, and market research, working with startups and established firms such as Flash , Thimblerr, Zetasuite, Manupatra, UpSwing, KlubWorks, InfraMarket, Jumio, Insticator, Mystifly, Chep, and Reliance. My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

projects.title: Dominos Pizza Sales
projects.description: Developed and implemented SQL queries to analyze Domino's pizza sales data. Key analyses included total orders, revenue calculation, most ordered and highest-priced pizzas, order distributions by time and size, and revenue breakdowns by pizza type and category. Leveraged advanced SQL techniques like JOINs, subqueries, and window functions to generate insightful business metrics and trends.

projects.title: Election AD Spend Analysis
projects.description: Conducted election ad spend analysis using Python libraries (Pandas, Plotly) to visualize total ad spend by state, average voter turnout, top parties by ad spend, and correlations between ad spend and voter turnout. Merged multiple datasets, performed data cleaning, and created insightful visualizations to support electoral strategy insights.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project. The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I: Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization. Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system. Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency. Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications. This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

detailed_profile.name: Apala Gwalera
detailed_profile.about: As a recent graduate of R.V. College of Engineering with a BE in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, I am passionate about applying my skills in data analysis, Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Power BI, Tableau, and Machine Learning to solve real-world problems and create value for businesses. During my internship at Rupeek Fintech Pvt. Ltd., I demonstrated my ability to lead a pilot initiative, implementing cost-effective strategies to optimize resource allocation and address manpower shortages. I generated insightful reports to facilitate data-driven decision-making and conducted in-depth analysis of customer data, identifying areas for business improvement. I also collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, delivering high-quality results within tight deadlines. I am currently seeking a Data Analyst position, where I can leverage my expertise in data analysis and optimization, and contribute to the growth and success of the organization. I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and enhance my skills and knowledge in the field. I am confident that I can add value to any team and project with my analytical, technical, and communication skills.

Developing and executing sales strategies to drive revenue growth.

Streamlining operational processes for efficiency and scalability.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project. The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I: Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization. Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system. Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency. Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications. This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.

projects.title: Dominos Pizza Sales
projects.description: Developed and implemented SQL queries to analyze Domino's pizza sales data. Key analyses included total orders, revenue calculation, most ordered and highest-priced pizzas, order distributions by time and size, and revenue breakdowns by pizza type and category. Leveraged advanced SQL techniques like JOINs, subqueries, and window functions to generate insightful business metrics and trends.

projects.title: Election AD Spend Analysis
projects.description: Conducted election ad spend analysis using Python libraries (Pandas, Plotly) to visualize total ad spend by state, average voter turnout, top parties by ad spend, and correlations between ad spend and voter turnout. Merged multiple datasets, performed data cleaning, and created insightful visualizations to support electoral strategy insights.

My core competencies include teamwork, leadership, and Microsoft Office. I am motivated by the challenge and satisfaction of finding the best fit for both the candidates and the companies.

of order management team, City fulfilment to generate

detailed_profile.name: Apala Gwalera
detailed_profile.about: As a recent graduate of R.V. College of Engineering with a BE in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, I am passionate about applying my skills in data analysis, Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Power BI, Tableau, and Machine Learning to solve real-world problems and create value for businesses. During my internship at Rupeek Fintech Pvt. Ltd., I demonstrated my ability to lead a pilot initiative, implementing cost-effective strategies to optimize resource allocation and address manpower shortages. I generated insightful reports to facilitate data-driven decision-making and conducted in-depth analysis of customer data, identifying areas for business improvement. I also collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, delivering high-quality results within tight deadlines. I am currently seeking a Data Analyst position, where I can leverage my expertise in data analysis and optimization, and contribute to the growth and success of the organization. I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and enhance my skills and knowledge in the field. I am confident that I can add value to any team and project with my analytical, technical, and communication skills.

projects.title: Dominos Pizza Sales
projects.description: Developed and implemented SQL queries to analyze Domino's pizza sales data. Key analyses included total orders, revenue calculation, most ordered and highest-priced pizzas, order distributions by time and size, and revenue breakdowns by pizza type and category. Leveraged advanced SQL techniques like JOINs, subqueries, and window functions to generate insightful business metrics and trends.

projects.title: Election AD Spend Analysis
projects.description: Conducted election ad spend analysis using Python libraries (Pandas, Plotly) to visualize total ad spend by state, average voter turnout, top parties by ad spend, and correlations between ad spend and voter turnout. Merged multiple datasets, performed data cleaning, and created insightful visualizations to support electoral strategy insights.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
I had the opportunity to design and implement scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark, processing millions of transactions to drive real-time risk analysis, ML feature engineering, and data-driven decision-making. These pipelines power millions in loan processing annually across various banks and FinTech clients.

🔹 Optimizing Loan Risk Prediction
By refining Kiview data pipelines, we improved loan risk prediction accuracy by 20% while reducing processing time, allowing for faster insights and accelerated model iterations.

🔹 Supercharging ML Feature Engineering
We built and deployed a high-performance pipeline for Ki-score models, handling 2500+ features with remarkable efficiency—cutting feature computation time from 33 hours to just 10 hours (70% improvement)! This dramatically enhanced model training speed and operational efficiency.

positions.subtitle: Kaleidofin
positions.description: Designed and developed a multi-tenant microservice from scratch, enabling seamless partner API integration while reducing customization overhead. This architecture streamlined client onboarding through a configuration-driven approach, significantly enhancing system flexibility. üîπ Accelerated Loan Processing: Optimized workflows to reduce loan processing time from 3-4 days to just 5 hours, improving operational efficiency. üîπ Integrated partial, full, and EMI payment flows across multiple gateways to support loans and savings transactions, enhancing scalability and collaboration for various bank and FinTech clients. üîπ Achieved a 20% increase in revenue, reduced customer support time by 40%, and shortened payment reconciliation by up to 70%. üîπ Developed OAuth2-based authentication and centralized Spring Security (RBAC) for partner onboarding, enabling secure, hierarchical user management and meeting payment gateway compliance üîπ Enhanced Risk Mitigation: Implemented questionnaire and credit bureau features, providing deeper insights for more accurate credit risk assessment. üîπ Security & Scalability: Integrated OAuth2-based authentication and centralized configuration management, ensuring robust security and scalability across diverse financial use cases. üîπ High-Code Quality & Reliability: Achieved 98% test coverage, delivering a highly reliable microservice for critical financial transactions.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company‚Äôs infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‚ÄòTop Impactor‚Äô award for delivering a successful and high-impact project. The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek‚Äôs infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I: Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization. Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system. Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency. Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications. This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek‚Äôs technological resilience.
positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
At Rupeek, a financial services provider serving 500,000+ customers, I played a key role in transforming the company’s infrastructure and operational capabilities, earning the ‘Top Impactor’ award for delivering a successful and high-impact project.

The challenge was to modernize and scale Rupeek’s infrastructure while ensuring robust security, high availability, and operational efficiency. To achieve this, I:

Dockerized 40+ microservices and deployed them to Kubernetes clusters, ensuring scalability, robustness, and efficient resource utilization.
Migrated the existing infrastructure to an AWS-based architecture, creating a secure, scalable, and future-proof system.
Implemented environment-agnostic deployments, adopting industry best practices to enhance development and operational efficiency.
Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets, strengthening data protection across all applications.
This initiative streamlined operations, improved security, and set the foundation for future growth, significantly enhancing Rupeek’s technological resilience.

positions.subtitle: HashedIn
positions.description: FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality. I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries. This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.
positions.title: Software Engineer

FourKites Connect is a scalable, automated, and secure solution for ELD onboarding, enhancing transparency and communication across supply chain partners. It enables shippers, carriers, and brokers to efficiently manage data relationships and optimize tracking quality.

I led the end-to-end development of this project, taking full responsibility for the backend. I built the backend using Spring Boot (Java) and integrated key services, including SendGrid, AWS, DocuSign, and Logentries.
This project streamlined ELD credentialing by automating manual processes, reducing time-to-onboard, and improving transparency for carriers and FourKites customers.
